entry.title: Automatic conversion of quantities-unit of measure on stock display
entry.content:
Hello, hope this message finds you well.


My question is about Warehouse Management on the Cloud Public.
I have set alternative uom on the product 43¬¥s masterdata. 1 bag = 10 pc.


But the stock is shown in the warehouse monitor with in the uom pc both in the regular and in the alternative one.


I have attached the print screens. 


I need for the system to automatically display both quantities (in base-uom and converted in alternative uom). Example: base uom 100 pc; alternative uom 10 bag. 


May you help me with that?


Best Regards


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

entry.title: Error while determining ref.mov.type for WM via Table 156S: 101/ /X/ /L/X/V
entry.content:
Hello Team,

we are trying to test below scenarios, and we encountered error- "Error while determining ref.mov.type for WM via Table 156S: 101/ /X/ /L/X/V" while creating Inbound delivery.

  1. external procurement of LEIH material with AAC -cost center
  2. Intra-STO for LEIH material type with AAC - cost center

I know there is one config. where we need to maintain above error entry in OMLR but there are lot of combinations so getting confused, can anyone guide here.

what entry exact entry should be there.

and also we are using EWM not WM so is this really needed to maintain this entry in OMLR.

entry.title: Non-Nettable Warehouse Inventory Calculated in ATP
entry.content:
My company is new to SAP - went live in October 2024. We have one warehouse designated and assigned as a non-nettable warehouse. We use this for non-conforming materials, unlocatable/lost inventory, items that need to be returned to a supplier and items that require inspection prior to being placed into available stock.

Our production personnel and customer service reps use the Available To Promise calculated numbers from the Item Master Data screen for their daily needs. The inventory in our non-nettable warehouse is being calculated as available, which is causing confusion and errors. How can I remove inventory from the non-nettable warehouse from showing on this 'at-a-glance' ATP calculation? MRP runs without calculating this inventory (perfect!) but I really need to remove it from the ATP calculations.

Example; Item# 622410-03-03, Qty 7 available in nettable warehouse 02.

Qty 22 NOT available in non-nettable warehouse 04.

Total actually available is 7. Total showing available in the 'at-a-glance' ATP calculation on Item Master Data is 29

Our partnering implementation company is advising our issue requires customization but I have a hard time believing this isn't an issue with many companies who use non-nettable warehouses. They have advised there are other reports to run to eliminate the calculation but ideally, we want our users to be able to use the calculated totals on the Item Master Data for ease. 

Thank you for your feedback!

entry.title: EWM-PI: Two users required to approve PI count
entry.content:
Hello SAP heros!

I'm trying to find a solution for my client's request on a PI workflow topic.

They handle some dangerous goods, and they want to have 2 people approving the count for PI documents. I think just having Supervisor and Clerk tolerance group is not enough, because in this case Supervisor can post eveyrhting themselves. We need a solution where both must approve before it gets posted.

Any ideas?

Thank you in advance! üôèüèª

entry.title: Negative and Positive stock in Embeded EWM storage Bin
entry.content:
Dear Colleagues, in an embedded EWM system, there is a -/+ stock in a single storage bin for the same batch of material. I verified that there is no stock discrepancy between EWM and ERP. This situation makes it impossible to conduct the annual physical inventory in the specified bin. Could you share your experience in resolving this issue?

Thanks

entry.title: Disable all options in dropdown list Tcode-VLMOVE and fix only one process
entry.content: We have requirement in VLMOVE t-code. When we select process there are multiple options available in the dropdown. We use option "transfer within plant (between storage location)" for our process but user mistakenly selects other option and then to reverse it we have to perform multiple steps which causes unnecessary delay, so we want to display the process "transfer within plant (between storage location)" automatically whenever we open VLMOVE to avoid any error. All other processes will be there in dropdown just our required one will be displayed automatically so that user does not have to select. Kindly provide a solution to achieve this

entry.title: Site 8012 cannot unpack and Repack STO HU's due to inconsistency.(255876)
entry.content:
I retriggered the SPED"s for all deliveries.

ERP Docs were create as per the process and thanks.

Now we have an issue with the Ship HU"s, cannot be Goods Receipted nor Unpacked and Repacked into IC PTWY HU.

When the User tries to Unpack, delete the Ship HU and then repack into an IC HU they get an error message.

"Not all Deliveries in this HU are blocked. Change is not possible".

However, the Site cannot ptwy with the associated HU"s. This is causing further delays. 

When trying to goods receipt by HU, the error message states "HU not planned" for HU 180040000411843682 

below are the HU"s associated with this shipment.

I changed the HU GUID Status to the following hoping the HU could be unpacked and then repacked into an IC PTWY HU.

/SCWM/HUSSTAT

226F521ACE021FD087E62134FE40EE90    E0001    X
226F521ACE021FD087E62134FE40EE90    IHU01    X
226F521ACE021FD087E62134FE40EE90    IHUS6    X
226F521ACE021FD087E6213518A9EE90    E0001    X
226F521ACE021FD087E6213518A9EE90    IHU01    X
226F521ACE021FD087E6213518A9EE90    IHUS6    X
226F521ACE021FD087E62135207B6E90    E0001    X
226F521ACE021FD087E62135207B6E90    IHU01    X
226F521ACE021FD087E62135207B6E90    IHUS6    X
226F521ACE021FD087E6217B20D7EE91    E0001    X
226F521ACE021FD087E6217B20D7EE91    IHU01    X
226F521ACE021FD087E6217B20D7EE91    IHUS6    X
668849E689021FD087E621351BAC3711    E0001    X
668849E689021FD087E621351BAC3711    IHU01    X
668849E689021FD087E621351BAC3711    IHUS6    X

Now these HU"s current status does not allow for Goods Receipt and ptwy activities to be completed.

entry.title: Does SAP Public Cloud WM work with Zebra MC3401 with android 13/14?
entry.content:
Hi,

I want to upgrade my scanners to the MC3401 with android 13/14. SAP only has one reference device mc9300 with android 11. To me it seems weird that it should only work on devices with android 11. My question is can I upgrade to MC3401 with android 13/14 with no problems?
EDIT: After some more digging my conclusion is that public runs on SAPGUI5 and this supports the newer android versions:
https://help.sap.com/docs/ABAP_PLATFORM_NEW/468a97775123488ab3345a0c48cadd8f/74b59efa0eef48988d3b716bd0ecc933.html?version=202210.000&locale=en-US
Because scanners use webview the scanners fall in the category of phones&tablets. 
Conclusion is that the scanner with android 13/14 will work fine with public cloud. Correct me if im wrong

entry.title: Prevent internal movement tasks from being created when a source bin already has tasks again it
entry.content:
Hi SAP,


Our warehouse team has inquired about a potential improvement opportunity that may help with accuracy and reduce human operator errors. 


The team would like to prevent internal movement tasks from being created when a source bin already has tasks again it, such as picking or putaway tasks.  We would still like to be able to create multiple picking and putaway tasks to the same location (source bin) but we wouldn‚Äôt want to be able to add internal movement tasks to a bin that is already a source bin for the other two types.


We would like to understand what is and isn‚Äôt possible with this.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.content:

Note: I will be using product substitution with Kit-to-order scenario where I will have specific item category for components already.

Thanks,

entry.title: Upload storage bin sorting does not work /SCWM/SRTUP in some cases
entry.content:
Hello,

 

I already used the storage bin upload /SCWM/SRTUP several times for the last 3-4 years without problems.

 

Now it doesn't work anymore in some cases.

 

I created some storage bins and tried to upload the sorting.

Unfortunatly I get the following message:

Storage bin ... is not assigned to activity area ... in W

This message is kind of weird because I want to assign the activity area with the upload. Here it sounds like it is a precondition.

 

Maybe it's because of the dots in the storage bin, but I already did the sorting for that kind of storage bin in the last months and there was no update in between.

I used it for another storage bin, that is called CONTAINER 3 and it worked as expected.

 

The only thing that we changed is that with we now have Office 365.

 

Does anyone have an idea?

 

Best regards

Jonas

entry.title: Improvements to Wave Simulation Stock Checks and Logging
entry.content:
Primary Question:
How can I configure my wave simulation to account for blocked bins and restricted batches, along with available stock?

Follow-up Question:
Additionally, how can I enhance the wave simulation logs to reflect the specific reason for a shortfall (e.g., blocked bin or restricted batch) instead of only displaying product, quantity, delivery, and line information?

Thank you in advance!

Kind regards

entry.title: HU Label Printing via Third-Party Application in S/4HANA Public Cloud EWM
entry.content:
Dear SAP Support,

 

We are working on S/4HANA Public Cloud ‚Äì Extended Warehouse Management (EWM).
We have configured RF transactions for Handling Unit (HU) receiving and internal warehouse movements.

 

Our business requirement is to print HU labels using a third-party labeling solution, such as NiceLabel or Loftware, instead of directly printing from S/4HANA Public Cloud.

 

We would like to understand:

 

  1.  

  2. What standard options are available in S/4HANA Public Cloud to integrate warehouse label printing with external applications?

  3.  

  4. How we can push HU label data from S/4HANA Public Cloud to an external labeling application for printing.

 

Kindly provide guidance and recommended approach for this requirement.

Regards

 


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

Can somebody clarify this point from business and technical point of view?

Thank you!

entry.title: Delivery document type OUTB has the wrong document category PDO
entry.content:
Hi All,

I am creating STO with in same plant with 2 different storage locations. These 2 Slocs are assigned to same warehouse. When I create deivery for the STO its getting stuck in the queue with message".

Delivery document type OUTB has the wrong document category PDOMessage No. /SCWM/ERPINTEGRATION004

Diagnosis

For the delivery, document type OUTB of category PDO was determined. However, the system was expecting document category SPC.

System Response

his message cannot be processed.

Procedure

Contact the system administration.

Procedure for System Administration

Change the determination of the document type ( Map Document Types from ERP Systemto WM System )."

I thought its standard procedure but wonder thing with same data I am able to post in Sandbox and delivery is distrubuting to EWM system without any error.

There is no confirguation in sandbox with SPC document category and configuration is same as development.

Could you please let me know if I am missing anything or any BC need to activate for this.

Regards,

Chand.
